description: The Department of Pediatrics is integrated into a dynamic research environment where innovative and effective treatments and cures are under development. We have a proven track record of excellence including breakthrough work in the long-term effects of cancer treatment, cardiac risk in patients with HIV, the development of clinical trials in pediatric cancers, obesity prevention, long-term outcomes of fetal surgery, sleep and pulmonary complications of HIV and sickle cell disease, and parent health literacy as a means of improving child health outcomes. \n\nFrom pediatric cancer to cardiology, prematurity and pulmonology, diabetes to developmental disabilities our physician scientists have discovered ways to treat and prevent a range of pediatric health challenges. In addition new work is being done with the treatment of PrEP and NPEP.
name: UNIVERSITY OF MIAMI - MAILMAN CENTER - ADOLESCENT MEDICINE CLINIC
